definition: charm or grace (in poetry or art)
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound

sentences.english: It is quite deferent from the idea of Shenyun held by Wang Shizhen.
sentences.chinese: 它与王士祯标举的“神韵”之美大异其趣。

sentences.english: Shenyun is the wonderful artistic world that the poets pursue and is also the poets' deep understanding and feelings about the world.
sentences.chinese: 神韵则是诗人追求的诗歌妙境，是对世界的感悟。

sentences.english: The nimble gait and charming spirits could well be the best dance one can find.
sentences.chinese: 轻灵的舞姿，动人的神韵，是我们能发现的最好的。

sentences.english: Jewelry blue with green border shows men's fashion verve.
sentences.chinese: 宝蓝色衫身绿边相衬，表露出男士时装的神韵。

sentences.english: The most marvelous scene here is the twelve mountains peaks and, in particular, Goddess mountain peak.
sentences.chinese: 景色最妙要数巫山十二峰，而犹以神女峰独具神韵。

sentences.english: As magnificent water palace JBL reveals the beauty of architecture design.
sentences.chinese: 如华丽的水上皇宫，精比例传达建筑设计的美妙神韵。

sentences.english: Chinese figure painting prominently features verve.
sentences.chinese: 中国人物画的突出特点的神韵。

sentences.english: For the past few years, I have largely taken up the responsibility for getting the venue for Shen Yun.
sentences.chinese: 几年来，我一直负责昆省为神韵找剧场的事。

sentences.english: King show here, the peak-to-peak amazed, have their own characteristics, each withverve.
sentences.chinese: 这里竞秀，峰峰称奇，各有特色，各具神韵。

sentences.english: The theory of literature activity system provides a new horizon for Shenyun study.
sentences.chinese: 文学活动系统理论的发展为研究神韵提供了新的视野。

sentences.english: Learning from Luo Pin, he liked to use dry ink with a side brush to draw flowers and birds.
sentences.chinese: 得罗聘神韵，喜用枯笔焦墨，他的花鸟画很有个性。

sentences.english: All pay-per-click search engines possess unique bidding nuances.
sentences.chinese: 所有付费点击搜索引擎具有独特神韵招标。

sentences.english: The lakeside beach has the essence of seaside beaches.
sentences.chinese: 湖滨浴场尽显海滨神韵。

sentences.english: The independence of spirit, exclusive for the strength of character.
sentences.chinese: 独立性为神韵，排他性为风骨。

sentences.english: Later, all those members went to watch the Shen Yun show.
sentences.chinese: 后来，俱乐部的成员都观看了神韵。

sentences.english: This article probes into the influence of Yan Yu's aesthetic thoughts on theory of romantic charm.
sentences.chinese: 笔者尝试深入探讨严羽的美学思想对神韵论的影响。

definition: implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest
to resemble nature itself/of the highest quality (idiom)
similar in expression and spirit/to bear a remarkable resemblance to
lit. spirit and marrow/the essential character
